response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its exceptional quality and features, it is valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 14000}
